channel.title: Making everyone in an area teleport at once
channel.description:
Okay, I'm having a problem with my Fight Pits. When the timer hits 0, and everyone in the Fight Pits Waiting room, doesn't get teleported. Only 1 person does.
Is there a way to make everyone inside that coordinates be teleported inside the Fight Pits once the timer hits 0?
Edit: Fixed.

item.title: Making everyone in an area teleport at once
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“bballman28, post:2, topic:222782”]Hmm Rich you put “WaitingRoom = false” maybe thats the problem try putting “true”. And if that doesnt work just make it that everyone just walks through in to the pits. Or take out waiting room and put a path to the pits.

Also make sure ur cords are correct.[/quote]

Na, it was the WaitingRoom = 300;, SWAT tested it on his server and helped me with it. Thanks though.

Read full topic
item.source: Making everyone in an area teleport at once

item.title: Making everyone in an area teleport at once
item.dc:creator: @bballman28 bballman28
item.description:
@bballman28 wrote:

Hmm Rich you put “WaitingRoom = false” maybe thats the problem try putting “true”. And if that doesnt work just make it that everyone just walks through in to the pits. Or take out waiting room and put a path to the pits.

Also make sure ur cords are correct.

Read full topic
